Uses of Class
com.github.git24j.core.Signature

    • Uses of Signature in com.github.git24j.core

      Methods in com.github.git24j.core that return Signature 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Signature Note.author() 
      Signature Commit.author()
      Get the author of a commit.
      Signature Note.committer() 
      Signature Commit.committer()
      Get the committer of a commit.
      static Signature Signature.dup(Signature sig)
      Create a copy of an existing signature.
      static Signature Signature.fromBuffer(String buf)
      Create a new signature by parsing the given buffer, which is expected to be in the format "Real Name timestamp tzoffset", where `timestamp` is the number of seconds since the Unix epoch and `tzoffset` is the timezone offset in `hhmm` format (note the lack of a colon separator).
      static Signature Signature.now(String name, String email)
      Create a new action signature with a timestamp of 'now'.
      Methods in com.github.git24j.core that return types with arguments of type Signature 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Optional<Signature> Commit.authorWithMailmap(Mailmap mailmap)
      Get the author of a commit, using the mailmap to map names and email addresses to canonical real names and email addresses.
      Optional<Signature> Commit.committerWithMailmap(Mailmap mailmap)
      Get the committer of a commit, using the mailmap to map names and email addresses to canonical real names and email addresses.
      static Optional<Signature> Signature.getDefault(Repository repo)
      Create a new action signature with default user and now timestamp.
      Optional<Signature> Mailmap.resolveSignature(Signature sig)
      Resolve a signature to use real names and emails with a mailmap.
      Optional<Signature> Tag.tagger()

      static Optional<Oid> Note.commitRemove(Repository repo, Commit notesCommit, Signature author, Signature committer, Oid oid)
      Remove the note for an object When removing a note a new tree containing all notes sans the note to be removed is created and a new commit pointing to that tree is also created.
